title: Ideology, tech key areas in Rahul Gandhi’s Congress revival plan - Hindustan Times
content: Ideology, tech key areas in Rahul Gandhi’s Congress revival plan  Hindustan Times
description: Former Congress president Rahul Gandhi had even sought suggestions in his close circles about leaders who can play a greater tole in the future. In one such discussion in January, the names of Mukul Wasnik, Ashok Gehlot, Bhupesh Baghel, Mallikarjun Kharge and Sachin Pilot came up.
